content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Guten Tag, Herr Abbasi. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I believe its prime location and modern features make it a fantastic place to live. I am open to discussing the rental price.

(As Peter Schmidt, I would try to negotiate for a higher price based on the location, size, and convenience of the apartment.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I agree that the location is convenient and the apartment has great features. However, I am also looking for a reasonable rental price. What is your initial price proposal?
(As Farhad Abbasi, I would aim to negotiate a lower price, taking into consideration my budget and financial situation as a student.)
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I understand, Herr Abbasi. Given the apartment's quality and location, I believe a fair starting price would be 1,200 Euro per month.
(As Peter Schmidt, I would aim to justify the higher price by emphasizing the apartment's benefits and location.)
If the negotiation continues, I would adjust my responses based on the given rules and try to reach a higher rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Herr Schmidt. While I appreciate the apartment's quality, I am a student with a limited budget. I would be more comfortable with a monthly rent of 950 Euro.
(As Farhad Abbasi, I would try to negotiate a lower price by mentioning my financial situation and expressing my interest in the apartment.)
And so on, adjusting my responses according to the negotiation progress and following the given rules.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think we are too far apart in our price expectations.
